First N.Y.S. Conf. on the Victims of Alcoholism (Workshop)
First N.Y.S. Conf. on the Victims of Alcoholism (Workshop)

Format: 1/2" open reel video; Duration: 60 min; Transfer Technician Notes: "Entirety of tape suffers from a constant control track error. Multiple TBCs were tested to obtain the best capture possible. Content suffers from persistent skew error affecting the entire frame, as well as flagging and image jitter throughout. Aside from these anomalies, there are occasional instances of minor dropouts and tape wear. Occasional inherent exposure adjustments. Audio distortion is inherent to the original recording."
